data.actual_result: You're scrolled back to the bottom of chat
data.expected_result: You're still jumped to the message selected
data.short_description: Closing Search before it finishes moving as you jump to a message scrolls you back to the bottom of chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Search in a channel you're scrolled to the very bottom of - Search for a message far back enough to scroll chat up so you can observe the bug - Jump to the message and exit out of Search before the chat finishes moving towards the message
